# nxos_banner_postlogin (Data Source)

This data source can read the Postlogin Banner configuration.

- API Documentation: [aaaPostLoginBanner](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-2-2/docs/Security%20and%20Policing/aaa:PostLoginBanner/)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nxos_banner_postlogin" "example" {
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `exec_banner` (String) Banner message.
- `id` (String) The distinguished name of the object.
